column5: Hey Guys  I use an app called tapatalk to access a couple of other boards.  Just wondering if you may be looking at installing it?  I admin another board and the install is quick and easy.  The end user app is very nice and easy to use.  thanks
Im pretty sure, that IP board has a free app for this board... Ill speak to the powers that be!!!

I asked this Months ago... I was told it was installed, by Rick... which it still obviously is not.  it is great for us Mobile users.. and alot more intuitive then the mobile version IP Boards provides.  G
